title: Memecoins come back to life. $WIF, $WEN, and $HEMULE make big gains
description: As bitcoin claws its way back to its all-time high, and the altcoins start to come out to play, there is no niche like the memecoins for making careful traders some large gains. $WIF, $WEN, and $HEMULE are among the top runners on Tuesday.

title: Solv Launches First Omnichain Yield-Bearing Token for BTC
description: Singapore, Singapore, March 26th, 2024, Chainwire Solv has announced the release of SolvBTC, the first yield-bearing BTC token for the omnichain landscape. Backed by a diverse delta-neutral portfolio, SolvBTC can provide BTC-based yields of 5-10%.  The development of SolvBTC is a major breakthrough for the Bitcoin ecosystem. As an omnichain token, the token can be […]

title: Robert Kiyosaki stirs debate with Bitcoin ponzi scheme concerns
description: In a recent statement on X, a popular social media platform, Robert Kiyosaki, the investment guru behind “Rich Dad, Poor Dad,” expressed concerns over Bitcoin. He mentioned the possibility of Bitcoin being a scam and a Ponzi scheme. His comments have sparked a discussion among investors and cryptocurrency enthusiasts. Despite these concerns, Kiyosaki did not […]

title: PEPE’s marketcap soars as KangaMoon presale draws investors
description: As PEPE's market cap aims for $50b after a tenfold surge, KangaMoon (KANG) emerges as a formidable contender with its presale success. #sponsored

title: Solana Chain Investors Seeking Alternative Meme Coin Eye NuggetRush As a Potential Buy
description: Although Solana meme coins continue to rally, they are causing a surge in activity that rivals Ethereum. NuggetRush has gained attention as a top alternative for Solana meme coins. title: WEN Joins Bybit Spot Trading with a Massive Prize Pool
description:
Set for March 27th, 2024, at 10 AM UTC, this event is key for WEN holders and the crypto community. Bybit adds WEN to its trading options, promising new opportunities and activities. title: BitMEX Founder Arthur Hayes Says Ethereum Will Catch a ‘Big Bid’ Amid ETF Hype – Here’s His Outlook
description:
The co-founder of the BitMEX crypto derivatives exchange Arthur Hayes is offering his prediction on Ethereum (ETH) less than three months after the approval and subsequent listing of spot Bitcoin (BTC) exchange-traded funds (ETFs). In a new The Wolf of All Streets interview, Hayes says he expects demand for Ethereum to pick up, especially if […]
